plot: When anxiety-ridden Barrett meets agoraphobic George, the two engage in a courtship over the phone, discussing the dates they would go on if their phobias didn't stand in the way. As the fantasies develop, the two must decide if they can put aside their fears in order to find real-life romance.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Relanxious
plot_es: When anxiety-ridden Barrett meets agoraphobic George, the two engage in a courtship over the phone, discussing the dates they would go on if their phobias didn't stand in the way.
